problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, DE ∥ BC, DF ∥ AC, EG ∥ AB, and AE:EC=N_0:N_1, if BC = N_2, then the length of FG is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵DE∥BC,∴\frac{DE}{BC}=\frac{AE}{AC},∵AE:EC=3:2,BC=10,∴\frac{DE}{10}=\frac{3}{5},解得DE=6,∵DE∥FC,DF∥AC,∴四边形DECF为平行四边形,∴FC=DE=10,∵EG∥AB,∴=,即\frac{CG}{10}=\frac{2}{5},解得CG=4,∴FG=FC-CG=6-4=2．故选:B．
